description: In one of the most dynamic and modern commercial localities of Lucknow, this office space is released on sale. With well fitted space, 7 parkings are also there which are completed safe and spacious. Facing towards west, office space sits at 3rd floor in its building. Present centrally in vicinity of nishant ganj, this office space is affordable for both the new business owners and that of enterprises too. CCTV security and medical facilities also emphasize the quality of this commercial place.
